commands.text: Oh?
Hey there. My name's Alana. Welcome to Flo...
And I'm......
BLOSSOM!!!!
Hi, Blossom...
Blossom's my girlfriend. And she gets waaaay too excited to meet new people.
So... what's your name?! Huh? HUH?!
WELCOME TO FLOURISH {name}!!!!
Blossom... you're going to scare them away!
Anyways... truly, welcome. We hope you have a lot of fun creating with us!
Uh {name}... hey. So... I kind of need your help.
I'VE GOT A DATE WITH BLOSSOM TONIGHT! I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO WEAR!
Please... can you help me pick out an outfit?
Aw.... whatever. I'll figure it out!
THANK YOOOOOU!!!!!!
Oooh... nice choice. All done?
Let's go!
Hey, {name}... Blossom should be here any minute.
Hi, Alana...
Oh.... h-h-hey, Blossom. You look... wow
Tehehehehe
Come on!!! Let's get some snacks!
Mmmm! SNACKS! Let's go!!!
Aw I wanted something else... Oh well!
I... uh... had a really good time tonight, Blossom!
Me too, Alana!
Blossom stares expectantly at Alana... should she :
hEeHeEhEe....
Hey, {name}! Thanks so much for helping me with my date. I couldn't have done it with out you! ...literally.
I hope you had fun and learned a lot. As for me... it's my bed time. See ya tomorrow, {name}!
